|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8074; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.2 GHz <!--2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 15:89:96 |oui = 15:89:96
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/16/2019 |estreldate = 10/23/2019 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07YT5G7M7 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B07Z5NZ9CQ |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1733 |rad2ac = ???? |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad3ax = 2402 |rad3ac = 1733 |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * Web GUI: https://linksyssmartwifi.com
Linksys is marketing this as AX5300 but it is not yet clear where this number comes from. 3 radios? :Wi-Fi Technology: AX5300 MU-MIMO Tri-Band Gigabit (1147+2402+1733 Mbps)
===Key Features=== :Tri-Band Dynamic Backhaul :2.2 GHz Quad-Core Processor :Next-Gen OFDMA Technology :4x4 MU-MIMO, Advanced Security :Four Gigabit Ethernet Ports, USB 3.0 Port :Easy Setup Easy Setup, Control from the App :4x Better Performance than an AC Router
===Specifications=== *Processor: 2.2 GHz Quad-Core *Memory: Flash: 512MB; RAM: 1GB *Number of Ethernet Ports: :1x Gigabit WAN, 4x Gigabit LAN *Other Ports: USB 3.0 *Antennas: Internal *Network Standards: :802.11a, 802.11b, 802.11g, WiFi 4 (802.11n) :WiFi 5 (802.11ac), WiFi 6 (802.11ax) *Wi-Fi Speed: AX5300 (1147+2402+1733 Mbps) *Wi-Fi Bands: 2.4 GHz + 5GHz (x2) *Wi-Fi Range: Large Homes *Wireless Encryption: up to 128-bit *Security Features: WPA2, WPA2 / WPA3 Mixed Mode *Easy Setup: Simple and secured App based set-up :Required for set-up: (1) Internet connection with Modem. :(2) Mobile device with Android 4.4 or iOS 9, Bluetooth preferred. *Power Supply: Input: 100-240V, 50-60Hz; Output: 12V/4A *Dimensions (LxWxH): 4.5" x 4.5" x 9.6" *Weight: 3.5 lbs
==Links of Interest== ===Rewiews=== *[https://spec.wifi-lifestyle.com/linksys-mx10-velop-ax-whole-home-wifi-6-system/ ''Linksys MX10'' on '''WiFi-Lifestyle''']
